2164.subject: LS
2164.descrlong:
Examines issues, problems, and solutions to equitable schooling in a pluralistic society. Viewing schools as social institutions that transform the cultural and political dynamics of society. The course focuses on history, politics, and theories of education for culturally and linguistically diverse populations. (May be classroom-based, hybrid or online.)

[(Prereq: LS 277S) and (Coreq: LS 398S)]
